name: Pixel's Inferno
description:
Travel through 9 circles of Pixel-Hell. Find a suffering soul on each level of hell and exchange your destinies with them

Controls:
Arrows (Swiping on phone) - move
R - restart
Z - undo step
Bump into NPCs to speak

Ended up without laptop on weekends, so made this game entirely on my phone, using PuzzleScript.
